author: notmcd
content:
> Is an incentivized large scale testnet planned before the mainnet realease? Attack nets are maybe fine for finding some form of bugs, but they don't attract massive community involvement. Could also avoid the problem of a low participation rate that Medalla is currently having.
<@694794553248448573>

author: ajsutton
content: An incentivised testnet would be one that uses real money.  But that *is* mainnet.

author: notmcd
content: Other projects have or had incentivized testnets and their main net benefited from it
